Reviews.Title: cable uses
Reviews.Author: Frank JGrafft Jr
Reviews.Content: I use it to download my pics to my computer, it is high quality as advertized . Thank you !

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare cable for the DX6490 Camera
Reviews.Author: Vin
Reviews.Content: This cable not only fits nice and snug as if it were the original cable but it is made of good quality materials, unlike the cheap stuff I have purchased in the past.  I wish the power supply would fit as snuggly.  It would be nice to have a longer cable but 4 1/2 I guess will just have to do.  I am happy with this cable purchase and I do recommend it to anyone that needs a replacement cable for their camera.

Reviews.Title: quality product
Reviews.Author: Larraine Smith
Reviews.Content: The product works for me.  Lost my original one in a move (found i after I got my order.) All good.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: J. Breuss
Reviews.Content: The USB plugged in and worked with no problem with my old kodak easyshare camera, I'm very happy I chose this one- inexpensive and works perfect!

ProductInfo.Features:
Kodak Part Number U-4 or 853 9249
10 year warranty
ProductInfo.Name: U-4 U4 USB camera cable lead for Kodak Easyshare
